ch0033_00_yakon/0101_0701_01_10:
Well, I’ll be! If it ain’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
So yer back, huh? Yer gutsy, kid. I like that!
ch0033_00_yakon/0101_0701_02_10: Y’all better show me yer tough side today!
ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_01_10:
Say, have y’ever seen a vibratin’
Palpitoad before? They’re a sight to
see, I tell ya! A real treat!
ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_02_10:
They’re pretty famous back in Driftveil
City in the Unova region—where I’m from.
ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_03_10:
That’s not why I brought a Palpitoad
here with me, though.
ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_04_10:
It’s really on account o’ the way
they show their true grit whenever
they battle!
ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0702_01_10:
If yer interested in seein’ 
some o’ that Palpitoad grit in action, 
you should come visit me in Unova!
ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0702_02_10:
You’ll prolly hear their cries all
over the place there!
ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_01_10:
Back in Unova, my Excadrill is
a must-have business partner when
it comes to minin’ work!
ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_02_10:
At one point in my life, I reckon I had
truly hit rock bottom. Lower than low.
ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_03_10:
But with Excadrill by my side, I was
slowly able to drill my way back up
the tunnel.
ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_04_10:
Inch by inch, we rose right back on up
to the surface!
ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_05_10:
To this day, I still dream about
all the hard work we did.
ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0702_01_10:
No matter how tough things get,
it’ll be all right in the end if you’ve
got yer Pokémon there beside ya!
ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0702_02_10:
So keep yer chin up, ya hear?
’Specially when the goin’ gets tough.
ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_01_10:
Gettin’ plenty o’ rest is part o’
yer job! Spread yerself too thin, ’n’
you’ll surely burn out.
ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_02_10:
As for me, I find that takin’ little strolls 
around town here on Pasio’s been 
a nice breath o’ fresh air.
ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_03_10:
This sure is a mighty-fine place.
I could learn a thing or two here...
Improve my city back home.
ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0702_01_10:
Lookin’ out at all them city streets
is one o’ the finest parts o’ my job,
I tell ya!
ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0702_02_10:
When I look up at them buildings, shaped
like nothin’ I ever seen before, heh,
even this ol’ boss gets excited.
ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_01_10:
Lookin’ out at the ocean reminds
me o’ Driftveil City.
ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_02_10:
I wonder how all the workers
back home are holdin’ up.
ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_03_10:
I’m hankerin’ to get back ’n’ see how
much all of ’em have grown since
I’ve been gone!
ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0702_01_10:
Them Driftveil City workers sure have got
some guts, lemme tell ya.
ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0702_02_10:
It’ll be nice to see everybody again.
Maybe I’ll buy ’em all some souvenirs
while I’m here!
ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Yer finally showin’
some true grit, ain’t ya.
ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_02_10:
But I reckon you’ve still got some room
to grow in those britches o’ yers.
Aim for the sky, I always say!
ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_03_10:
If y’all can face yer opponent head on
’n’ win—no cheap tricks—I reckon
y’all have got some real skill!
ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_01_10:
Mayhaps I said a li’l too much just then,
for an ol’ miner like me, anyway.
ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_02_10:
I do commend ya on yer youth and
passion and grit—but that don’t mean
I gotta like ya!
ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_03_10:
It ain’t often somebody gets a
compliment outta ol’ Clay!
ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey there, kid!
Fancy meetin’ ya here!
ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0701_02_10:
I was just fixin’ to give ya this!
Go on—use it how ya like!
ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s just a trifle, kid. But I expect ya
to return the favor someday!
ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0702_02_10:
Hrmmph! No need to get all worked up now!
That’s jus’ my way o’ sayin’ thanks.
ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_01_10:
You wanna talk about work?
If yer lookin’ for idle chat,
take yer yapper elsewhere.
ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_02_10:
You shouldn’t get too overly familiar
with work people, see? That’s just
business fundamentals right there.
ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_03_10:
Hah, the workers back in Driftveil City
are a different story, though!
ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_01_10:
You got a sharp eye, kid. And you ain’t
lackin’ much in the cool, calm, and
collected department, neither!
ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_02_10:
That critical judgment o’ yers’ll come
in handy for ya someday—you’ll see.
Jus’ stay sharp, kid!
ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_03_10:
When ya boil ’em down, Pokémon
battles ’n’ doin’ business
ain’t so different.
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_01_10:
So, ya fancy yerself a bona fide Trainer
now, do ya? You’re learnin’ the ropes
pretty well—I’ll give ya that!
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_02_10:
Just don’t go gettin’ all content and complacent
yet, ya hear?
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_03_10:
If yer expectin’ a bonus, ya better be willin’ to do
whatever it takes! No givin’ up halfway, got it?
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_01_10:
Work ’n’ business are all about trust.
Seems yer startin’ to understand
that pretty well!
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_02_10:
I ain’t never thought about havin’
business partners before.
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_03_10:
But you’ve got some good prospects, kid.
If—and that’s a BIG if...
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_04_10:
If ya won’t take no for an answer,
come ’n’ see me in Driftveil City!
ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_05_10: I’ll hire ya on at my company!
ch0033_00_yakon/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s still mornin’, kid.
Let’s figure out how ta put this day to good use!
ch0033_00_yakon/3002_0701_01_10:
Lemme tell ya, wakin’ up early does a world
o’ good. Makes the whole day longer!
ch0033_00_yakon/3003_0701_01_10:
Hope you ate a hearty lunch, kid.
We still got a whole day ahead of us!
ch0033_00_yakon/3004_0701_01_10:
Don’t get me wrong.
I got nothin’ against a good nap now and again.
It’s all about gettin’ that shut-eye!
ch0033_00_yakon/3005_0701_01_10:
Ah! Night.
Now, let’s see who can stay awake longer...
ch0033_00_yakon/3006_0701_01_10:
I know nighttime’s for sleepin’, but ya know...
it’s tough to lose so much time.
